channel.title: Discoverability of this forum: Link to socialhub from main activitypub.rocks
channel.description:
Hi folks,
I just noticed that this forum isn't listed on and linked to at the main <https://activitypub.rocks/> page. So people interested in ActivityPub won't be able to find this wonderful resource from the project's main page.
Who is able to fix this and put a link there, @cwebber maybe?
Are there other places we'd like to link to this forum?

item.title: Discoverability of this forum: Link to socialhub from main activitypub.rocks

item.title: Discoverability of this forum: Link to socialhub from main activitypub.rocks
item.dc:creator: Sebastian
item.description:
Duplicate of what I told @cwebber but also :

Discussing the evolution of the activitypub.rocks site Community
Following the recent APConf in Prague, I tried going through the resources at hand for new ActivityPub implementers, reviewing what we could improve to ease the onboarding. activitypub.rocks plays a major role in this, being the main landing page for the protocol. In the meantime, this forum has been created and made public. It could play a major role at organizing the information long-term for varied audiences, but would not replace ap.rocks as a landing page, which means we have to properly l…

Read full topic
